content: drift away into meditative corner-to-corner stitches as you crochet your own butterfly blanket self-striping yarn takes care of many of the color changes and guarantees that no two butterflies turn out exactly the same ﻿skills you ll practice include double_crochet changing colors weaving in ends and a how to add a gorgeous shell border ﻿this ad-free printable pdf includes crochet instructions to make the blanket plus a c2c crochet graph pattern and written line-by-line instructions to go with the graph and if you re a visual learner you ll love the option of following allow with the line-by-line color block instructions instead line-by-line written or color block instructions are incredibly helpful because they - reduce the likelihood of mistakes that need to be torn out - allow you to crochet much faster than if counting squares in a graph - make it easier to set down your work and know right where to pick the pattern back up when made with worsted weight cyc category #4 yarn as pictured the finished blanket measures 39 x 39 notes are included to increase the size by a few inches to make a significantly larger blanket try using a heavier yarn throughout downloading -
